month.d110609: Try doing things in a completely new way today. Start by reading the Club Penguin Times backwards like this - Day Backwards It's! Luck Good!
month.d120609: It's the day of the big green parade! Paint your penguin any shade of green and start a parade across the island with 20 other green penguins!
month.d130609: Start finding! Get a group of friends together and have a race to complete the Adventure Hunt. Be the first to spot everything!
month.d140609: Find a buddy and go find a plant that eats snowballs. Hint: Throw snowballs at every plant you see until you find it!
month.d150609: Prepare for take-off at the Beacon of the Lighthouse! Play Jet-Pack Adventure and try flying the whole course without getting any coins and win a huge bonus prize!
month.d160609: Attention explorers! Grab your best explorer's outfit and uncover the mysterious stone puffle statue. Lead 10 penguins to it, calling “This way to the stone puffle!”
month.d170609: It's a busy day in the Coffee Shop! Put on your apron and get to work. Serve 10 cups of coffee to thirsty penguins.
month.d180609: Check out the Dojo igloo contest winners in the newspaper! Buy some furniture from the catalog in the Ninja Hideout & recreate your favorite in your own igloo!
month.d190609: The new pin is out, so make sure you find it and wear it! Help other penguins discover it by giving them clues!
month.d200609: Head to the Stage to star in Fairy Fables! Try playing all of the roles, then pick your favorite and put on a play with your buddies.
month.d210609: Make buddies with 7 penguins from different countries. Make sure you all wear your country flag pins!
month.d220609: Form a sports team with your buddies and start a game at the Soccer Pitch. Choose a team color to wear and make up cheers for your team!
month.d230609: Make sure you have all the colors from Penguin Style. Then get together with your friends and throw a color party!
month.d240609: Challenge someone to a Card-Jitsu match and earn your next belt. If you're already a ninja, practice in the secret Ninja Hideout.
month.d250609: Pretend to sink the Iceberg! Get a bunch of buddies to turn light blue and dance on the Iceberg so that you all look like water on top of the 'berg!
month.d260609: Ch-ch-check out the new DJ3K tracks in the Night Club today and celebrate by starting a dance party in your igloo! Don't forget to decorate.
month.d270609: At the Pizza Parlor, flick the switch on the Pizzatron 3000 and turn your pizzas sweet! Quickly make 8 candy pizzas without making a mistake.
month.d280609: Go Ice Fishing and hook as many fish as you can - then cook your catch for some buddies at a party in your igloo!
month.d290609: Time to hit the dance floor and show off your moves! Challenge a buddy to a dance-off in the Night Club.
month.d300609: Waddle along to the Coffee Shop and go upstairs to the book room! Read all of the books and then wear the secret item that's hidden in one of them...
month.d010709: Make a buddy smile. Tell your 5 favorite friends that you think they're terrific by sending a Penguin Mail postcard!
month.d020709: Put on your Tour Guide hat and take a new penguin around the island, teaching them everything they need to know about Club Penguin! If you're not a tour guide, take a tour!
month.d030709: Sensei's at the Hideout! Wear your belt around the island and let everyone know that Sensei has come to visit.
month.d040709: Celebrate under the fireworks by getting your penguin buddies together at the Iceberg and forming lines of different colors. Then... Dance!
month.d050709: Go to the Forest and pretend to be an animal! Try to get 10 different animals there, and pretend to have your own zoo!
month.d060709: Travel! Log in and choose the French language! Waddle around and say “Bonjour”!
month.d070709: Do Mission #1 & look for a hidden penguin by the Ice Rink. If you're not a Penguin Secret Agent, join by clicking the M at the top of your screen & take the quiz!
month.d080709: “You Decide!” Head to the What's New Blog and help choose an item for the August Penguin Style catalog!
month.d090709: Create a store in your igloo! Pretend you're the most successful shop-keeper on the island and sell furniture items or pets!
month.d100709: Ruby and the Ruby is at the Stage! Go read the script and then be Jacques Hammer or Ruby all over the island. Ask questions about the missing ruby!
month.d110709: Play Medieval hide and seek on the island by dressing in your favorite Medieval-style outfit and chasing penguins who say “roar!” If you have a dragon costume, get knights and princesses to chase you!
month.d120709: Head to the Penguin Style catalog at the Gift Shop. Get 10 friends to pick a new outfit, grab your camera, and go to the Cove to have a fashion show!
month.d130709: Take your puffle to the game it helps you play! Then walk around the island with your pet & let everyone know how awesome your pet is!
month.d140709: Go visit 15 igloos & tell the owner something that you love about their igloo.
month.d150709: Take your soccer ball to the Iceberg and start a dance party!
month.d160709: Head to the Portuguese server and say “Penguinando!”. It's like saying “Waddle on!” See if you can get 5 penguins to say it back.
month.d170709: Rock? Country? Pop? Get your outfit, instrument & friends! Check out every stage, pick your favorite, and get 5 penguins dancing!
month.d180709: The new furniture is out! Make your igloo the coolest place to rock and then invite 10 penguins to a loud igloo party!
month.d190709: Use your All-Access pass to get behind the scenes. Find a penguin to interview about their favorite times jamming with their band!
month.d200709: Find a cool band and let them know you'd like to help their success! Grab them a pizza, or dance to their songs.
month.d210709: Wackiest Music Jam outfit day. Cram the Lighthouse Stage in your wackiest outfit!
month.d220709: Make your igloo into an airplane and pretend to fly all over the world!
month.d230709: It's day 50 of 101 Days of Fun! Can you help to get a group of at least 10 penguins on the Iceberg to show happy face emotes?
month.d240709: You get to vote for the new penguin color! Head to the Forest and help decide! Cheer for your favorite color around the island.
month.d250709: Take your purple or blue puffle out and about and visit other igloos! You can decorate your own igloo (try purple and blue) to host a puffle party.
month.d260709: Last day of the Music Jam! Join your friends for a massive “dance off” at your favorite stage.
month.d270709: Play the secret hidden game on a computer in Mission #3. If you're not a Penguin Secret Agent, and are 30 days old, join by clicking the M at the top of your screen & take the quiz!
month.d280709: It's a symphony! Press E and then T to show the music note emote and then get your buddies to fill up an igloo with sound!
month.d290709: Take your puffle for a walk around the island and give other penguins tips on how to be the best pet owner ever!
month.d300709: Starting at the Cove, get at least 10 penguins in a line and walk around the entire island!
month.d310709: Transform your igloo into the ultimate performing stage, then invite others to come put on a show!
month.d010809: Play one level of every single game on the island.
month.d020809: Go to the Stage, grab some detective gear from the catalog and spend some time investigating the island!
month.d030809: Find your scuba gear, head down to the Underground Pool, and have a snorkel party!
month.d040809: Dance, wave, and sit in any order, then see if other penguins can follow your moves!
month.d050809: You Decide! Head to the What's New Blog to help select a new furniture item!
month.d060809: Check out Penguins Around the World on the Community page of the website, then send us a picture of your toy penguin preparing for the Festival of Flight!
month.d070809: Celebrate the new color release with a game of tag. When you get tagged, turn aqua and pass it on!
month.d080809: Have a shopping race with a buddy! Start at the Snow Forts and see if you can run to the Gift Shop, buy a new outfit, then return to the Snow Forts in 1 minute.
month.d090809: Form a group with other penguins and pretend you're a car. Waddle around the island together and give other penguins a lift!
month.d100809: Waddle up to the Book Room for a blast from the past. Find the hidden pyramid in the 2007-2008 Yearbook!
month.d110809: Be the funniest penguin possible! Go tell everyone your favorite joke on stage at the Lighthouse.
month.d120809: Slow down! See if you can be the last penguin down the hill while playing Sled Racing with your buddies.
month.d130809: What kind of sunglasses does Aunt Arctic wear? Find out by moving your mouse around page B5 of the Club Penguin Times, then tell 5 friends!
month.d140809: Find the new pin! When you do, draw attention to it by forming a big circle around it with the other penguins in the area.
month.d150809: Transform your igloo into an airplane, then invite other penguins over and watch the fun take flight!
month.d160809: Go to the Pet Shop and practice your Puffle Roundup skills. Try capturing the blue puffles first, then the rest, one color at a time!
month.d170809: Talk to your buddies using only emotes! See how many times you can make other penguins smile :)
month.d180809: Try to find your penguin twin! Look at other penguin's player cards and see if you can make buddies with a penguin who is dressed-up just like you today!
month.d190809: Start a wave at the Cove! Get a bunch of blue penguins together, then as a group walk back and forth in the water shouting 'Wave!'
month.d200809: Start a game of Copy Me at the Night Club. Whatever you do, get your friends to do it too. Try dancing, using emoticons or telling a joke!
month.d210809: You've caught the rhythm bug, and you can't stop dancing! Coordinate a conga line of 20 penguins and dance around the island.
month.d220809: Describe a Club Penguin character or event to your buddies without saying its name. Feel free to use clothing items as props and see if they can guess it in 5 tries!
month.d230809: Head to the Surf Shack at the Cove and play Catchin' Waves in Survival Mode. Try staying on your board long enough to see the shark!
month.d240809: Turn your igloo into a superhero HQ and recruit a team of penguins who are eager to help save the day! Your team's first task, offer to save 10 penguins in need of help.
month.d250809: Find a penguin wearing at least 3 clothing items, then try to guess which is their favorite. If someone guesses your favorite item, display a smiley emote!
month.d260809: Check out the new play at the Stage! See if you can memorize one character's lines, then recite them to other penguins around the island.
month.d270809: Give your throwing flipper some practice! Meet up with your buddies at the Snow Forts and cover the Penguin Stadium sign with as many snowballs as you can.
month.d280809: Start a game of soccer at the Soccer Pitch! Get two teams together and see how many goals you can score in a match.
month.d290809: Ninjas should exchange Card Jitsu tips in the Hideout! If you don't have your black belt, head to the Dojo and learn to play Card Jitsu!
month.d300809: Become a puzzle master! Start by solving this week's Puzzle Shuffle in the Club Penguin Times, then check out the Boiler Room for other newspaper puzzles!
month.d310809: Let your buddy help design your igloo! Put some furniture items in the middle of your igloo, then ask them where they would put everything!
month.d010909: Help your buddies find all the buoys in Club Penguin from 1 - 8. They're hidden in games, missions and rooms. Good luck!
month.d020909: You Decide! Head to the What's New Blog and help decide on a catalog item!
month.d030909: Take a shift as a lifeguard at the Underground Pool. Help 5 penguins stay safe by teaching them how to swim.
month.d040909: Attention all ninjas! Show up at the Cove wearing your ninja gear, then watch your surroundings closely for a fiery surprise.
month.d050909: Start a game show in your igloo and come up with silly prizes for the first 5 winners!
month.d060909: Have some fun giving out fashion advice at the Gift Shop. Try to get at least 3 different penguins to wear your favorite new item!
month.d070909: Pretend you're in a synchronized swimming team. Get a crowd of at least 10 penguin in the water and make shapes together!
month.d080909: All flippers on deck! Climb aboard the Migrator and see how many penguins you can get to climb up the mast to the Crow's Nest.
month.d090909: Find the emerald hidden aboard the Migrator by playing Treasure Hunt. Have a buddy help you; emerald hunting is hard work and you won't find one in every game.
month.d100909: Have some fun playing games at the Fair today! Try collecting 101 tickets as fast as possible.
month.d110909: Find a pin made especially for 101 fans! Hint: Walk, waddle, or run to the place that the first 101 activity was done.
month.d120909: Hold an igloo party and share stories about your favorite 101 activity, then tell us what you enjoyed most on the What's New blog!
